column4: hey folks, I`ve got this new keyboard and it has some keys that have more than 2 chars (4 chars actually)
How am I supposed to type these other keys, SHIFT in combo with another key plus this key ?
pretty dumb question but I need to type a pipe char and I cant do it
ops
wastrel!
heya
all
my keyboard doesn't have a compatible correspondent layout so I end up by missing some chars
is there a way to customize the keyboard layout ?
system > pref > keyboard
yeah, I'm already there... but my keyboard isn't either a 104 nor 102 layout
it is a genius keyboard but its layout doesn't fit in any of the layouts to choose from this preferences dialog
it should be an ABNT2 keyboard, but it seems there are some discrepancies
Is there a place where I could download additional keyboard layouts or something ?
Or maybe reconfigure the available ones to fit my keyboard ??
are you brazilian? what keys don't work?

yeah :) I'm having a hard time with the backslash key... on my keyboard it is located in the lower left corner (left of shift) but in the Brazil layout it is just above the enter key - the problem is that my enter key is bigger (taller) and the only key above it is backspace
other than that, in overall the Brazil's layout works fine
there is apps for windows that creates layouts, google may help you, is there a key named "Fn"?
other question, can you type "~" over "a" or "o"?
I can't see a key named "Fn"
I can't to this
